landingPage.heroTitle1: Sharpen Your Mind. Master Your Time.
landingPage.heroSubtitle: ClashMind: Where intellectual development meets performance-based rewards. Optimize your abilities, compete, and win real value.
landingPage.slogan1: Invest in your brain, not in a skin.
landingPage.slogan2: You don't waste your time, you optimize it.
landingPage.slogan3: ClashMind: The platform that respects your intelligence.
landingPage.step1Desc: Register (18+) and begin your journey of intellectual growth and skill refinement.
landingPage.step2Desc: Enter the Cortex Arena. Here, your strategic thinking and mental acuity directly translate to real value Sparks.
landingPage.step3Desc: Manage your Spark earnings. Deposit to play, and withdraw your skill-based winnings securely.
landingPage.noGamesAvailable: No duels available on the Grid currently. Check back soon!
landingPage.neuronsDesc: A measure of your growing skill and strategic mastery. Earned by outperforming opponents, Neurons reflect your intellectual development on the Grid.
landingPage.sparksDesc: Currency with real value, earned solely through your performance. Wager Sparks, win duels, and withdraw your skill-based earnings.
landingPage.communitySubtitle: ...and thousands more strategists waiting for you on the Grid!
landingPage.buildersProgramDesc: Join our community on Discord/Forum to co-create the next generation of intellectual duels and shape the future of ClashMind. Your ideas matter!
landingPage.brainValueSimulatorTitle: How Much is Your Brain Worth?
landingPage.brainValueSimulatorDesc: Discover your potential cognitive value! Our upcoming simulator will estimate your intellectual earning power based on your skills, Neuron ranking, and performance. (Feature Coming Soon!)
landingPage.responsibleGamingDesc1: ClashMind is committed to responsible gaming. Real money gaming is for entertainment and should be approached with caution. You must be 18 years or older (or the legal age of majority in your jurisdiction) to play.
landingPage.responsibleGamingDesc2: Gambling can be addictive. Please wager only what you can afford to lose. Set limits, understand the risks, and seek help if you need it.
landingPage.responsibleGamingDesc3: ClashMind promotes a safe and fair gaming environment. For help with problem gambling, please visit recognized support organizations.
landingPage.footerSlogan: Develop Your Mind. Optimize Your Time. Earn Through Performance. 18+
landingPage.tripleProfitabilityDesc1: Gain Cognitive Skills: Each duel sharpens your mind.
landingPage.tripleProfitabilityDesc2: Gain Personal Value: Climb the Neuron rankings and prove your intellect.
landingPage.tripleProfitabilityDesc3: Gain Sparks: Translate your skill into potential real-value earnings.

gamblingWarning.title: Important Notice: Real Money Gaming
gamblingWarning.intro: Welcome to ClashMind! This platform involves wagering with "Sparks," which can be purchased with real money and have real monetary value. Winnings can also be withdrawn as real money (subject to terms and conditions).
gamblingWarning.ageRequirement: You must be 18 years of age or older (or the legal age of majority in your jurisdiction) to participate in real money gaming.
gamblingWarning.addictionWarning: Gambling can be addictive. Please play responsibly and only wager what you can afford to lose. Understand the risks involved before participating.
gamblingWarning.resourcesInfo: Resources for help with gambling addiction are available. Visit our "Responsible Gaming" section for more information.
gamblingWarning.acknowledgeButton: I Understand and Confirm I am 18+ (or of Legal Age)
gamblingWarning.acknowledgementHint: By clicking, you acknowledge these risks and confirm your eligibility.

projectInfo.ethicalPrinciple1: 1. Equality: Fair competition for all. Skill is the only differentiator.
projectInfo.ethicalPrinciple2: 2. Transparency: Clear rules, open communication about game mechanics and data usage.
projectInfo.ethicalPrinciple3: 3. Real Progression: Focus on genuine cognitive skill development, not addictive loops.
projectInfo.ethicalPrinciple4: 4. Respect: A community built on mutual respect and constructive interaction.
projectInfo.ethicalPrinciple5: 5. Autonomy: Empowering users with control over their data, time, and spending.
projectInfo.ethiqueClashMindLabel: The 'Ã‰thique ClashMind' label signifies our internal commitment to uphold these principles in every feature and game.
projectInfo.dataTransparencyDesc: We are committed to full transparency regarding the data we collect and how it's used to enhance your ClashMind experience. A detailed, manageable dashboard of your data will be available soon. We do not engage in hidden advertising or disguised impulsive purchases. Your trust is paramount.
projectInfo.freePlayModeInfo: We are working on 'Practice Modes' for our games, allowing you to hone your skills without wagering Sparks.
projectInfo.communityDesc: Become a ClashMind Builder! Connect with us on Discord/Forum (links coming soon) to share feedback, co-create games, and help build a positive, supportive community focused on intellectual growth.

academy.topic3: Techniques for memory improvement and rapid calculation.
